instructions: From any home screen, tap Messaging . Tap the Menu icon at the top right. Tap Settings > Emergency alerts . Select or clear check boxes for the following options: Imminent extreme alert Imminent severe alert AMBER alert Alert sound Alert vibration Sound and/or vibrate during calls

From the apps list, tap Email . Tap the Menu icon with three dots at the top right. Tap Settings , then tap the email account. Adjust the following under 'NOTIFICATIONS': Tap the New Emails slider to turn notifications on or off. Tap Notification sound to change the alert tone. Tap Sound with vibration to turn on vibration.
From the apps list, tap Settings > Sound > Ringtone . Choose your ringtone, then tap OK .
From the apps list, tap Contacts . Tap desired contact. Tap the Pencil icon. If you don't see the Rington field, tap More > Ringtone . Tap Ringtone and choose your ringtone. Tap OK .
